articles.title: Command of Forces of KPA in Western Sector of Front Issues Open Notice
articles.content:
Command of Forces of KPA in Western Sector of Front Issues Open Notice
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The Command of Forces of the Korean People's Army in the Western Sector of the Front issued an open notice on Feb. 19 as regards the plan of the south Korean military warmongers to stage a brigandish naval shelling drill in the waters around five islands in the West Sea of Korea on Feb. 20 with the territorial waters of the north side as their target.
					 The notice says:
					
					 Such move of the war-like forces is a premeditated military provocation to defend the illegal "northern limit line" at any cost and drive the overall situation on the Korean Peninsula into the phase of war by straining the situation in those waters to the highest pitch of tension.
					
					 As regards the prevailing situation, the Command of Forces of the KPA in the Western Sector of the Front is authorized to issue the following notice:
					
					 The territorial waters of the DPRK side in the West Sea of Korea are the waters where its sovereignty is exercised.
					
					 Once the group of traitors starts a reckless military provocation in those waters, trespassing on the DPRK's inviolable marine demarcation line, and in case just a single column of water is observed in its territorial waters, the KPA will promptly make  merciless retaliatory strikes. 
					
					 In this regard, all civilians who either live or engage in occupation on five islands in the West Sea and in their vicinity are advised to evacuate in advance to safe areas before nine o'clock on Feb. 20 when the puppet military warmongers will kick off the provocative naval shelling.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors should not forget the lesson taught by the Yonphyong Island shelling case that occurred on Nov. 23, 2010.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Feats of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Feats of Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il made public a historic work on Feb. 19, 1974,  proclaiming a programme of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea. 
					 The work serves as a monumental document that comprehensively indicates the way for successfully accomplishing the Korean revolution pioneered under the banner of Juche.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun today says this in a by-lined article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il proclaimed the programme, thus making it possible for the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung to shed its more brilliant rays as the great guiding idea in the era of independence and providing a powerful weapon for making the Korean revolution advance dynamically despite any trial and ordeal.
					
					 It was the undying feat performed by Kim Jong Il in leading the cause of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea that he developed in depth the revolutionary idea of the President and immensely glorified it as a great idea steering the era of independence, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 His undying feats lie in the fact that he strengthened the driving force for the Korean revolution in every way with the single-minded unity of the service personnel and people around their leader as a cornerstone.
					
					 His immortal feats found their manifestation in the facts that he steadily developed all the fields of revolution and construction as required by Juche.
					
					 It was none other than Kim Jong Il who clarified that the revolutionary idea of the President was the only idea to advance the Juche era. 
					
					 It was the great historic feats performed by Kim Jong Il on behalf of the country and its people that he further enriched the Songun idea based on the Juche idea as required by the era and the developing revolution.
					
					 The feats Kim Jong Il performed by strengthening and developing Songun Korea into a single-minded power shining with the idea and august name of the leader are brilliantly recorded in the history of the Workers' Party of Korea and revolution.
					
					 The single-minded unity of the DPRK was strikingly demonstrated before the whole world during the period of mourning over the demise of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il led the Korean revolution only along the road of victory on the principle of Juche all his life. 
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, an epoch-making turn was brought about in the drive for building an economic power of Korean style and improving the living standard of the people and a stirring reality in which the requirements of the Juche idea were met in all fabrics of social life was unfolded.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Overseas Compatriots
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Overseas Compatriots
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Saturday received a letter from the members of the delegation of overseas compatriots on the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 For all overseas Koreans far away from their homeland, the DPRK was like a mother whom they missed awake or asleep and care of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il under which they would like to come always, the letter said, adding:
					
					 Long ago Kim Jong Il clearly indicated the road to be followed by the Juche-oriented overseas Koreans movement with his farsighted wisdom and energetic leadership. When we did something, though small, for the country and people, he highly appreciated it and honored us with the Order of Kim Il Sung, Labor Hero and the National Reunification Prize, enabling us to enjoy an eternal life. 
					
					 This loving care of the tender-hearted father is still reaching us thanks to the warm love and benevolence of you identical to Kim Jong Il in ideology, leadership and virtues.
					
					 Taking part in the events commemorating the Day of the Shining Star, we came to have the unshakable faith that Kim Jong Il will always be with us, overseas Koreans, and immortal like the sun thanks to your leadership and more firmly grasped the truth that no force on earth can match the might of the Korean people single-mindedly united around you.
					
					 We will visit compatriots everywhere they live to rally them around overseas compatriots organizations, patriotic legacies of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, and thus strengthen their forces.
					
					 By doing so, we will invariably hold you in high esteem as the lodestar and father of the nation just as we followed Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and become genuine overseas Koreans remaining loyal to you with good achievements in opening the gate to a thriving nation, his earnest last instruction, not as mere overseas compatriots receiving his loving care.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Football Team Wins at 2012 Four-Nation Women's Soccer Invitation
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Football Team Wins at 2012 Four-Nation Women's Soccer Invitation 
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The 2012 Four-nation Women's Soccer Invitation took place.
					 The DPRK team drew 0:0 in the last game with Chinese rival on Sunday, winning the title of the soccer invitation.

articles.title: Iran Starts Fueling Tehran Research Reactor with Fuel Rods
articles.content:
Iran Starts Fueling Tehran Research Reactor with Fuel Rods
 Teheran, February 18 (KCNA) -- The first home-made nuclear fuel rods were to be placed into Tehran research reactor, the semi-official ISNA news agency reported on Wednesday.
					 "We have started enriching uranium to 20 percent to build nuclear fuel rods since Western countries are reluctant to provide us with assistance", Iranian deputy nuclear negotiator Ali Bagheri was quoted as saying.
					
					 "In the presence of the president, some new and worthwhile achievements of the country's nuclear scientists in the field of atomic energy will be unveiled" on Wednesday, Iran's presidential website announced on Tuesday.

articles.title: Business Worsens in Japan
articles.content:
Business Worsens in Japan
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The amount of power generated and purchased by Japan's 10 utilities in January fell 5.3 percent from a year earlier to 87.43 billion kilowatt-hours, down for the 11th straight month, an industry body said Monday.
					 This was due to economic depression.
					
					 Dai-ichi Life Insurance Co. on Monday reported its group net profit in the April to December period fell 19.0 percent from a year earlier to 12.71 billion yen.

articles.title: Solution to Issue of Comfort Women Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Solution to Issue of Comfort Women Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers' Corps in south Korea held a press conference before the "government's" building in Seoul on Feb. 15 and urged the authorities to take a positive option for settling the issue of comfort women for Imperial Japanese Army.
					 A press release was read out at the conference.
					
					 The press release recalled that the victims and their bereaved families are mounting their voices demanding a solution to the above-said issue.
					
					 But the present authorities are only repeating such words as "a proposal for a bilateral agreement was delivered to Japan" and "they are waiting for an official reply to it", it said, adding:
					
					 This is little short of outbursts let loose by the authorities to forgive the shameless attitude of the Japanese authorities to evade a legal responsibility for the issue, making a spate of reckless remarks that the above-said issue has been settled.
					
					 The release noted that the victims of the sexual slavery can no longer wait for the apology and reparation for it as they are leaving this world one after another with pent-up grudge unsettled.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers Stage Anti-"Government" Action
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers Stage Anti-"Government" Action
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Members of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and workers of Ssangryong Motors held a press conference before the building of "Saenuri Party" on Feb. 15 in demand of the withdrawal of the unjust layoff measure.
					 The speakers at the press conference recalled that 1 000 days have passed since the workers of the factory started their action against the unjust layoffs in May 2009.
					
					 Due to the protracted layoffs, the number of dead is on the steady increase, they held.
					
					 Blasting the deceptive labor policy of the party, they urged the ruling party to come out to adopt a law banning the layoff and other ones on vital rights of the workers.
					
					 They warned whoever goes against the demand of the workers for the settlement of the issue will never escape a stern punishment.

articles.title: Pro-reunification Personage Sentenced to Penal Servitude in S. Korea
articles.content:
Pro-reunification Personages Sentenced to Penal Servitude in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The Pusan District Court of south Korea sentenced to prison terms the secretary general and former executive chairman of the Pusan Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration on charge of the violation of the "Security Law" on Feb 14.
					 The authorities have persistently cracked down upon leading members of the organization after labeling the legitimate movement for reunification waged by the above-said headquarters for last several years as "enemy-benefiting actions".
					
					 The above-said court took this action this time, claiming that it is dangerous for the organization to have literature containing the north's assertions.
					
					 Progressive civic and social organizations in the area of Pusan strongly rebuffed the unreasonable ruling of the fascist authorities as an undisguised denial of the June 15 joint declaration and the moves to stamp out the progressive forces.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, Son of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il, Son of Mt. Paektu
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- An international organization and a Brazilian organization posted on their Internet homepages special write-ups on the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain on Feb. 8 posted on its Internet homepage One Corea Network articles with an image of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In an article titled "Son of Mt. Paektu" the homepage told a story about the mysterious weather on Mt. Paektu on the day when he was born, saying that even the sky seemed to congratulate him on his birth.
					
					 Mt. Paektu is associated with so many stories with profound meanings, it noted, and went on:
					
					 As people say a man is apt to resemble the area where he was born, Kim Jong Il resembled Mt. Paektu in the true sense of the word.
					
					 It attracts so many people for its majestic appearance as it has large Lake Chon on its top and is surrounded by myriads of mountain peaks and mysterious natural wonders. 
					
					 They are a symbol of Kim Jong Il's personality and spirit featured by his high aims, extraordinary wisdom, strong grit and will, broad magnanimity and perfect commanding art. 
					
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK on Feb. 11 posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il will always live in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive mankind" with the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The homepage introduced Mt. Paektu, Jong Il Peak, Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp and the grand opening of the meeting for greeting the sun in the 21st century in the area of Paektusan Secret Camp on the occasion of the February holiday in 2002.
					
					 It went on: Pyongyang in February is still covered with snow but tens of thousands of red Kimjongilias are in full bloom in the festival venue on the bank of the Taedong River, beautifully decorating the significant holiday.
					
					 It dealt with the background against which Kimjongilia came into being and stories that there appeared the organizations going by the name of the immortal flower and greenhouses in different countries and Kimjongilias cultivated by world people with sincerity are being displayed at the flower festival venue in February.
					
					 Kimjongilias will more beautifully bloom along with the august name of the peerlessly great man, attracting all people, it stressed.
					
					 It edited a photo on the Kimjongilia festival venue.

articles.title: Feats Praised by Foreign Organizations, Figures
articles.content:
Work Published in Syria
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Dar Damascus Publishing House of Syria on Feb. 5.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is a powerful political mode in the present era which carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of giving importance to the army and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode that most correctly reflected the requirements of the times and the revolution. It also deals with the validity, advantages and great vitality of the Songun politics.

articles.title: Events Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Events Held in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Diverse events took place in different countries between Jan. 28 and Feb. 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il. They included meetings, book and photo exhibitions, handicraft exhibitions and film shows in Kyrgyzstan, South Africa, Mongolia, Brazil, Egypt, Myanmar, Ecuador, Bulgaria, Uganda, Ethiopia and Nigeria and an event held by the Women's International Democratic Federation. 
					 Displayed in their venues were immortal famous works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, books and photos on the revolutionary life and undying feats of the peerlessly great persons and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and creative talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan in a speech said that Kim Jong Il comprehensively developed in depth the Juche idea and the Songun idea of Kim Il Sung and consolidated the single-minded unity of the whole society as firm as a rock through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 The chairman of an area committee of the African National Congress of South Africa noted that the DPRK has registered signal achievements in building a thriving nation and global independence has dynamically advanced along its orbit as Kim Jong Il pursued the original Songun politics.
					
					 The chairman of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development said Kim Jong Il made a great contribution to ensuring peace and security not only in the Korean Peninsula but in the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 The chairman of the Brasilia Federal District Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party stressed that one of the greatest contributions made by Kim Jong Il was that he pursued the Songun politics, enabling the DPRK to proudly rank itself among the nuclear weapons states. 
					
					 The general director of the Ministry of Sports of Myanmar said that the world is recognizing the extraordinary Songun revolutionary idea and shining army commanding caliber of Kim Jong Il, adding it was entirely thanks to his Songun leadership that the Korean People's Army grew to be an army of the people enjoying their love and support and an invincible army capable of beating any formidable enemy at one blow.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched Korean films "Korea Today", "Reply of Korea", "Arms of Korea", "The Tower of the Juche Idea", etc.
					
					 A message to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting in Mongolia.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary Commemorated by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary Commemorated by Foreign Media 
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups and foreign broadcasting services aired commemorative programs on the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The Russian paper Komsomolskaya Pravda Vladivostok on Feb. 10 carried a special write-up under the title "Praying for the immortality of Comrade Kim Jong Il" illustrated with a photo of him visiting Russia by train.
					
					 The Russian paper Cesnoye Slovo No. 3 devoted its one whole page to a special write-up under the title "Great man produced by Korea is always alive in the hearts of the people" with the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and a photo of him finding himself among soldiers.
					
					 The Nepali paper Noya Kotparwa on Feb. 9 edited an article titled "Desire of leader Kim Jong Il" illustrated with the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Ethiopian paper Reporter on Feb. 11 dedicated one whole page to a special write-up with the above-said portrait under the title "Leader Kim Jong Il will always be alive. On his 70th birth anniversary".
					
					 The Jordanian paper Al Diyar on Feb. 2 and 4 carried articles praising him for giving scientific and theoretical answers to all the issues arising in the revolution and construction and working world-startling miracles with his brilliant wisdom and distinguished leadership ability.
					
					 Radio of Democratic Congo in commemorative programs on Feb. 10 and 11 said Kim Jong Il wisely led the Korean revolution and global independence for years, performing undying feats on behalf of the times and history.
					
					 Television "Tele Andina 23" of Ecuador on the same day showed "Kim Jong Il's Birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp" and other Korean films.
